name: Hope
description: Take my hand precious little one. I'll guide you into the dappled light. To your skin's first kiss by the sun. I see it clearly your future so bright. And yes of course I'll be right there.  As your cheeks first touch the air. All my hopes, dreams, and prayers. Held tight between swaddle layers. My undying love envelopes all of you. My sweet darling dream come true.
